pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena brāhmaṇena saṅghassa payopānaṁ paṭiyattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.6: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.7: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu saṅghaṁ ārabbha davaṁ karissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.8: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhikkhu, saṅghaṁ ārabbha davaṁ akāsī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.11: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, saṅghaṁ ārabbha davaṁ karissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.15: “na, bhikkhave, buddhaṁ vā dhammaṁ vā saṅghaṁ vā ārabbha davo kātabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.17: Atha kho bhagavā taṁ bhikkhuṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:1.21: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca surusurukārakaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
